阿斯報：

阿仙奴正嘗試簽下皇馬19歲攻擊中場 Cesar Gelabert，阿迪達親自觀看了皇馬青年隊 vs 熱刺、車路士青年隊的比賽，甚至還親自撰寫了針對該球員的“球探 ”報告。 涉及該球員的轉會談判即將開啟。

阿迪達用GPS追蹤眾兵狀態

【Now Sports】球壇停止比賽和多數尚未正式復操，阿仙奴領隊阿迪達便使用GPS追蹤球員的狀態。

英超球隊操練徹底停頓，幾乎全部球員都留在家中作個人操練，如何確保各人狀態，將決定復賽後的成績。阿仙奴就利用GPS來追蹤球員的身體狀況，甚至有體能部門分析各人的數據，以保持良好狀態。

巴西球星大衛路爾斯（David Luiz）和波斯尼亞後衛高拿舒亞均經常在社交網站上載在家健身的片段。據悉，目前大多數球隊都使用類似科技保持球員體能，包括阿仙奴的同市宿敵熱刺。

熱刺則選擇與STAT Sports合作，球員的體能數據一一傳回球隊，由專業團隊分析和作出建議；領隊摩連奴還透過Zoom與職球員開視像會議。

【Now Sports】中場辛迪卡蘇拿縱橫球場多年，遇過最難纏的後衛是沙治奧拉莫斯。

「實在很難只說出一個，因為我很幸運地面對過很多偉大的球員，但若論最難擊敗的應該是沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）。」曾效力維拉利爾、阿仙奴的辛迪卡蘇拿（Santi Cazorla）表示。

卡蘇拿是近年球壇有名的「再生戰士」，在2016年腳踝受重創，嚴重得一度以為需要截肢，幸好最終保得住雙腳，於2018年回歸黃潛艇後重上高峰，更再度入選西班牙國家隊。

難怪卡蘇拿以「嘗試在比賽中獲得快樂」去形容自己的球員生涯，更認為自己最好的性格是永不放棄，力戰到最後。至於需要改善的地方，34歲的他說：「頭槌！」

巴塞隆拿球王美斯原來也有佩服的球星，他就是法國球星亨利。美斯表示第一次見面時，甚至不敢直視對方。

法國球星亨利（Thierry Henry）於2007年離開阿仙奴加盟巴塞隆拿，球王美斯接受《隊報》訪問時，透露對比自己更早揚名四海的亨利感到畏懼：「他第一次入更衣室，我根本不敢看他的眼睛。我知道他在英超的歷史，牆上還掛過他的畫像，突然間大家就成隊友了。」

美斯球技出眾，但佩服亨利的足球風格，「我喜歡他的快速破門，他一切動作都非常自然，包括奔跑、假動作、入波動作，一切都恰到好處，他是我非常欣賞的球員。」美斯續說。

亨利和美斯合作3年，獲2008/09、2009/10年球季的西甲冠軍；2009年更獲得6個冠軍，那是巴塞隆拿近代最輝煌的一個球季。

The Arsenal Foundation has joined forces with HIS Church to deliver 15 tonnes of emergency supplies into Islington.

Working with Islington Council as part of the borough’s emergency response plan, the donation will provide more than 30,000 free meals, as well as essential items such as sanitary and personal hygiene products to those most vulnerable in the local community.

This initiative forms part of our wider community response to COVID-19, which has seen Arsenal in the Community staff volunteer to transport frontline NHS workers. The Arsenal Foundation has also pledged £100k to local organisations and redirected a further £50k of partnership funding with Islington Giving towards their COVID-19 Crisis Fund.

Alan Sefton MBE, Head of Arsenal in the Community, said: “We are very proud to be able to support the people of Islington during this challenging time. Islington Council have set up an extremely well-coordinated response and it is essential that we play our part in supporting that.

“This aligned community response is the result of a lot of hard work and collaboration with a number of local organisations. By working together with Islington Council and others, we hope we can continue to identify and support those in our local community who most need our support.”

The Arsenal Foundation and Arsenal in the Community have a long history of working with HIS Church, a registered charity based in Lincolnshire that has been providing help to foodbanks across the country for the past 13 years.

Before the COVID-19 outbreak, HIS Church were distributing just over 50,000 meals a week across the UK. Due to overwhelming demand, they are now distributing around 200,000 meals a week through a network of more than 15,000 charities.

跟隊記者 Charles Watts：

阿仙奴夏窗在鋒線上的優先目標為 Jonathan David（根特）和 Odsonne Edouard（些路迪）。 理想情況下，阿仙奴更願意留下奧巴美羊，出售拿卡錫迪。 但在此之前，對槍手而言最關鍵的事情是，要先解決好奧巴美羊的去留問題。

在其他位置上，托里拉和高拿仙歴可能會被槍手出售，用以籌集轉會資金。 阿仙奴對馬體會後腰 Thomas Partey 仍然有相當大的興趣。

Exclusive: Arsenal tell players they can avoid wage cuts through Champions League qualification

Arsenal are four points off fifth and face a battle to qualify for either European club competition

Arsenal have proposed to their players that they will not have to take a pay-cut for losses incurred by the club during the coronavirus crisis should they qualify for the Champions League - if and when the current Premier League season resumes.

The proposal is believed to have been a non-starter with many of the squad who currently sit five points and four places off Manchester United in fifth, currently the last Champions League spot given Manchester City’s Uefa suspension from the competition.

The Telegraph understands that the measure was put to Arsenal players this week as the club tried to negotiate a pay cut – the like of which has so far proved impossible for any of the Premier League to agree with their squad.

Arsenal are by no means assured of a Europa League place next season, let alone one in the Champions League for which they last qualified for in 2016 for the following season. The club’s wage bill, annually £230 million, has been a problem since they dropped out the elite competition with director Josh Kroenke, son of owner Stan, describing it as “a Champions League wage bill on a Europa League budget”.

The club reported losses of £27.1 million in February and they are reliant on matchday income for up to 25 per cent of their revenue, the highest proportion of any club in the top 25 of the World Money League, compiled by Deloitte. Any pay-cuts proposed to Premier League squads are being opposed by the players’ union, the Professional Footballers’ Association who says their members should only be asked to take wage deferrals - which are the basis of agreements struck at Southampton and West Ham.

Arsenal’s position is complicated by the postponement of their game in hand against Manchester City which means the pair as well as Sheffield United, currently seventh, have played one game fewer than the rest of the top ten. A spokesman for Arsenal said that nothing had yet been agreed by the club with its players.

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/football/2020/04/11/exclusive-arsenal-tell-players-can-avoid-wage-cuts-champions/

加蓬足總主席叫Auba出「廠」

【Now Sports】再有球壇中人建議奧巴美揚離開阿仙奴，今次是加蓬足總主席。

奧巴美揚（Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang）跟阿仙奴的合約在2021年夏天完結，雖然領隊阿迪達希望留下這名今季已轟入20球王牌射手，但盛傳他被歐洲多支強隊青睞。

加蓬足總主席莫古安基（Pierre Alain Mounguengui）認為：「我不想說阿仙奴沒有雄心，但他們的目標不如歐洲列強般遠大，所以Auba應該加盟一支更有鬥心的球隊，他一定可以在那裡取得一席之地。」

莫古安基指，奧巴美揚以世界上其中一位最佳球員，「我建議他繼續努力吸引更大的球會。他仍然未曾贏得任何一個重要錦標，足球是看整體成績的運動，現在他於兵工廠沒有冠軍落袋。」

圖片來源 : ©AFP

阿迪達驚球員隔離屈到病

【Now Sports】阿仙奴領隊阿迪達坦言，關心球員在自我隔離時的心理狀態。

一眾球員在新型冠狀病毒疫情下，沒有比賽沒有操練，只能留在家中；體能尚可做gym維持，但心理上隨時「屈到病」。

阿迪達（Mikel Arteta）表示：「他們有所有需要的器材及指引去保持最佳的體能狀態，但我同時關心他們的心理狀況，因為這跟足球息息相關。」

阿仙奴陣中有不少外援於倫敦獨自居住，跟家人分隔兩地，他們最需要被保護。阿迪達說：「我希望他們可以感到跟我很接近，可以信任我，可以把任何感受告訴我。」

阿迪達已從新型冠狀病毒痊癒，但曼城主帥哥迪奧拿的母親在本周因此不幸離世。阿迪達表示曾安慰前上司：「他們很親近，整個家庭都很團結。」

圖片來源 : ©AFP
